name: vulhub-leaderboard
description: A modular, secure, and gamified platform for cybersecurity students to practice, compete, and grow

scripts.build:packages: pnpm --filter @vulhub/schema build && pnpm --filter @vulhub/utils build && pnpm --filter @vulhub/config build && pnpm --filter @vulhub/ui build
scripts.db:dev:migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm api-dev pnpm prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:dev:seed: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm api-dev pnpm prisma db seed
scripts.db:dev:studio: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm -p 5555:5555 api-dev pnpm prisma studio
scripts.db:prod:migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm api pnpm prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:prod:seed: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm api pnpm prisma db seed
